LanguageData.VG_ClothI.label: Synthread
LanguageData.VG_ClothI.description: Researches methods of weaving synthread. \nUnlocks the recipe for synthread at the loom.
LanguageData.VG_ClothII.label: Hyperweave
LanguageData.VG_ClothII.description: Researches methods of weaving hyperweave. \nUnlocks the recipe for hyperweave at the loom.
